title: Fishing Planet: Sailor Collection Pack
description: Joining a yacht crew, a skilled angler-sailor requires premium quality fishing gear, functional clothing, and ample storage. The Sailor Collection Pack has you covered!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Sailor Collection Pack
<!--text-->
Joining a yacht crew, a skilled angler-sailor requires premium quality fishing gear, functional clothing, and ample storage. The Sailor Collection Pack has you covered!
 
Featuring the AquaShield™ waterproof jacket and SolarSentry™ cap, it ensures protection from the elements while looking stylish and neat. The TsuribiShades™ Glasses not only reduce glare and enhance vision in varying conditions but also add a stunning touch to your look.
 
With Tsurihito™ spinning and Fletch and Bradford™ casting setups, plus an array of baits and lures, you’re set for some great catches. A spacious tackle wagon holds over 300 items, while additional marker and navigation buoys aid in exploration.
 
Discover the Kaiji No Ri island waters for 7 days with the included pass, license, and Premium account. Get ready for an unforgettable fishing adventure with your friends!

Sailor Collection Pack includes:
* 100000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 20 Marker Buoys
* 100 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

5 NAVIGATION BUOYS


RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Tsurihito™ Kōdo Kyatchā 7' 2" (220) SE - Length: 7' 2" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 1/2–4 Oz (14-122 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 55–148 Lb (25-67 kg); Action: Fast
* Fletch and Bradford™ Ocean Fury 5' 7" (170) SE - Length: 5' 7" (1.7 m); Lure Weight: 7/8–6 Oz(24-168 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 66–185 Lb (30-84 kg); Action: Moderate

Reels:
* Tsurihito™ Tsunami Koiru 15000 SE - Ratio: 7.7; Recovery: 49.2" (125 cm); Capacity: Mono 121/345 (0.95/345), Braid 94/800 (0.41/800); Max Drag: 146 Lb (66 kg); Drag: Front
* Tsurihito™ RaidenWheel HeavyDuty 18000 - Ratio: 7; Recovery: 41.3" (105 cm); Capacity: Mono 132/370 (1.0/370), Braid 104/900 (0.42/900); Max Drag: 183 Lb (83 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal


TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 2500 yd (2500 m);
OceanPower Mono .0413" (1.05 mm) - Test: 143 Lb (65 kg)
OceanPower Mono .0472" (1.2 mm) - Test: 176 Lb (80 kg)
ZenLine Braid .0177" (0.45 mm) - Test: 146 Lb (66 kg)
ZenLine Braid .0189" (0.48 mm) - Test: 185 Lb (84 kg)

* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0433 (1.1) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 143 Lb (65 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0433 (1.1) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 143 Lb (65 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .049 (1.25) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 176 Lb (80 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .049 (1.25) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 176 Lb (80 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)

* Single Hook Pilkers: 2 1/8 Oz. (60 g), #4/0 (x6); 2 4/5 Oz. (80 g), #5/0 (x6); 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g), #6/0 (x6)
* Double Hook Pilkers: 4 3/8 Oz. (125 g), #6/0 (x6); 5 3/10 Oz. (150 g), #7/0 (x6)
* Bucktails: 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x6); 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #4/0 (x6); 1 1/4 Oz. (35 g), #5/0 (x6); 1 3/4 Oz. (50 g), #6/0 (x6)
* Plugs: 3 Oz. (85 g), #8/0 (x6); 4 1/16 Oz. (115 g), #8/0 (x6); 5 3/10 Oz. (150 g), #10/0 (x6)
* Squid Jigs: 1/2 Oz. (15 g), #2/0 (x6); 7/8 Oz. (25 g), #3/0 (x6)


EQUIPMENT
* UL-CHUBER Tackle Wagon Quadro Pro  - Tackles: 300; Lines: 25; Groundbait Components: 150
* SolarSentry™ Fishing Cap - Tackles: 3; Flashlight: No; Flashlight Slot: Yes
* AquaShield™ Angler Jacket - Tackles: 20; Lines: 2
* TsuribiShades™ Glasses
* OceanCharm™ Rod Case - Rods: 6; Reels: 6; Lines: 18


FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Japan License


POND PASSES:
Kaiji No Ri Pass (7 Days)
